bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Fairfax County was formed in 1742 from Prince William County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1765-1861, of Fairfax County consist of court papers related to judgments (1765, 1797), guardian's account of the heirs of John and Margaret Gretter (1806), and two inventories of property confiscated by the county that belonged to individuals who joined the Union army (1861.)

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
